scripts.postinstall: kui-compile && KUI_STAGE=$(cd . && pwd) CLIENT_HOME=$(cd . && pwd) node node_modules/@kui-shell/builder/lib/configure.js && (cd packages/app/build && rm -rf css && mkdir css && cd css && for i in ../../../../node_modules/@kui-shell/core/web/css/*; do ln -s $i; done && for i in ../../../../theme/css/*; do ln -s $i; done)
scripts.test: echo "for now, we are only testing npm install"
